overview: (Alawi) is married to his cousin (Sherwit), but he loves the daughter of his other uncle (Najwa), (Najwa) is was investigated  about the disappearance of her cousin. The owner of the house in which the body is located informs the police. She is a lawyer whose father was a former officer and loves police work. She is very observant. She assists (Zaghloul Darderi), the detective officer in charge of revealing the mystery of the two incidents.

production_companies.name: Masr for Studios and Film Production

title: القناص
